MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB280200990
Licensee Name: Holy Cross Children's Services
Licensee Address: 8759 Clinton-Macon Road
Clinton, MI 49236
Licensee Telephone #: (517) 423-7451
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Dawn Teneyuque, Designee
Name of Facility: Holy Cross Services - Northern Michigan CB
Facility Address: Suite B
1305 E Eighth Street
Traverse City, MI 49686
Facility Telephone #: (231) 922-9664
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency requested to change their office location from 1305 E Eighth Street,
Suite B, Traverse City, MI 49686.
The Division of Child Welfare Licensing is required to determine compliance with
the following rule:
R 400.12204 Facilities.
(1) An agency shall provide and maintain sufficient office space, equipment, and
supplies to ensure the delivery of services.
(2) An agency shall have physical office space with a Michigan street address.
III. Methodology
An on-site inspection was made on March 6, 2019 to 3597 Henry Street, Ste. 102,
Norton Shores, MI 49441
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The agency has a first-floor office in Norton Shores, MI. The office is located near
the corner of Henry Street and Seminole Road.
When you enter the building, the suite is located to the right. Upon entering the
suite there is a waiting room area outside of public view on the right and the
receptionist area on the left. Past the receptionist area and to the left is the
kitchen area and board room. The board room can be used for private meetings.
Past the receptionist area and to the right is the family meeting area, the
supervisor’s office and an office that currently houses three foster care workers.
At least one more worker could be housed in this office. Across from the
supervisor office are two Herman Miller type offices for two more workers, one
housing the licensing worker. Both of these could house two workers each if the
staff grows larger.
Moving past the office housing foster care workers is another desk and an area for
files and a copy machine. The filing cabinets are locked and there is plenty of
room for more filing cabinets. There is a locked file cabinet for CHRI documents.
The cross shredder is located in the receptionist area.
The proposed office change to 3597 Henry Street, Ste 102, Norton Shores, MI
49441 has enough office space, equipment, and supplies to ensure the delivery of
services.
2

V. Recommendation
I recommend approval of the change of office location for Holy Cross Services
Northern Michigan CB to 3597 Henry Street, Ste 102, Norton Shores, MI 49441.
March 7, 2019
________________________________________
Bill White Date
Licensing Consultant
March 11, 2019
_________________________________________
Claudia Triestram Date
Area Manager
3
